pr_title: Add support for CREATE SCHEMA name AUTHORIZATION

timeline.bodyText:
shouldn't this be one line above.
CREATE SCHEMA x AUTHORIZATION owner_of_x WITH (properties...), instead of
CREATE SCHEMA x WITH (properties...) AUHTORIZATION owner_of_x?
I see that in SqlBase.g4 it is defined differently.
timeline.author: kokosing
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -9,6 +9,7 @@ Synopsis
 
     CREATE SCHEMA [ IF NOT EXISTS ] schema_name
     [ WITH ( property_name = expression [, ...] ) ]
+    [ AUTHORIZATION ( user | USER user | ROLE role ) ]

timeline.bodyText: Please give an example with properties. Also it would be nice to give fully featured example for hive connector with custom schema owner and schema location.
timeline.author: kokosing
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -40,6 +41,14 @@ Create the schema ``traffic`` if it does not already exist::
 
     CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS traffic
 
+Create a new schema ``web`` and set the owner to user ``alice``::
+
+    CREATE SCHEMA web AUTHORIZATION alice
+
+Create a new schema ``web`` and allow everyone to drop schema and create tables in schema ``web``::
+
+    CREATE SCHEMA web AUTHORIZATION ROLE PUBLIC

timeline.message:
Add support for CREATE SCHEMA name AUTHORIZATION

This adds support for setting a different owner (user or role) when a schema is created.
